extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
[Blocker] (After an opponent's attack, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
[Permanent] If you have a "Son Gohan : Adolescence" with 20000 power or more in your Battle Area, this card can't be removed from the Battle Area by your opponent's skills.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [Auto] When this card inflicts damage with an attack, choose up to 1 Battle Card in your opponent's Battle Area and it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [On Play] If your Leader is awakened, add up to 1 red non-"Son Goten" Battle Card with a cost of 3 or less that includes "Son" in its card name from your Drop to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [On Play] If your Leader is awakened, choose up to 1 Battle Card in your Battle Area and it gets +10000 power for the turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [Permanent] [Your Turn] If you have a "Vegeta" with 20000 power or more in your Battle Area, this card in a Battle Area gets +15000 power.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
[Activate Main] Switch this card in a Battle Area to Rest Mode : If your Leader has "Saiyan" in its special traits, choose up to 1 Battle Card with "Saiyan" in its special traits in your Battle Area and it gains [Critical] for the turn.
([Critical]: When this card inflicts damage with an attack, the life is placed in the Drop.)

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
[Super Combo] (A maximum of 4 cards with [Super Combo] can be placed in a deck.)
[Auto] [Opponent's Turn] When you use this card in a combo from your hand, this card gets +10000 combo power.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [On Play] Choose up to 1 of your Leaders or up to 1 Battle Card—both with "Saiyan" and "Earthling" in their special traits—in your Battle Area and it gets +5000 power for the turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [Critical] (When this card inflicts damage with an attack, the life is placed in the Drop.)

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [On Play] If your Leader has both "Saiyan" and "Earthling" in its special traits, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand. Then, play up to 1 Battle Card with a cost of 1 from your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
[Evolve] (You may pay the skill cost and play on top of the specified card in a Battle Area) 1: "Vegeta" with "Lookout" in its special traits
[Activate Main] Once per turn If your Leader is "Trunks : Future" and you have a "Hyperbolic Time Chamber" in your Battle Area, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand. Then, switch this card in a Battle Area to Active Mode.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Android 18" and add it to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of their owner's deck in a random order. Then, play up to 1 skill-less "Android 18" with a cost of 3 or less from your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [When Attacking] At the end of the turn, place this card from a Battle Area at the bottom of its owner's deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: [End of Your Turn] If your Leader has "Universe 6" in its special traits and a Battle Card in your Battle Area is returned to its owner's hand during this turn, draw 1 card.
